column4: okay can someone help me install a WIRELESS USB CARD step by STEP?

well no one else is asking about it...?
lots of people learn from answers in the channel
search for linux-headers
sudo aptitude install linux-headers-$(uname -r)
do the command as above
you have a config issue with sudo
does the command " date " return correct time ?
no need to yell
use tab complete on nicks or people won't notice your posts
